channel.title: Brand new 317 RSPS Gear-upx come play now!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/wkl1ys.jpg[/img]
What is Gear-upX? Gear-upX is a mid-sized Runescape private server, that's brand new.The economy is stabilized and we have fixed all dupes. There are currently some Moderator positions available, and our forum is very close, friendly, and quite active. Want a server you'll be addicted to? This is the one for you. Currently working on making pking more popular, and necessary in order to make the game more fun. Our owners have done a great job making sure the combat is balanced. they have made sure that everything is balanced perfectly, making sure not to add many of the weapons and armors that have made RuneScape Pking ruined.
Basic Features: Stable Economy, All dupes are fixed! PERFECT, balanced Pking! No custom items! Working Clanchat, with lootshare! Client has preferences you can change Skillcape Emotes Duel Arena, Warriors guild, God Wars dungon, Pest control, Tzhaar caves, and more! All skills work!
Client has many options, to suit anyone's needs:
Duel Arena:
Claws and Ags are both very well balanced, with correct animations!
Don't worry, there's no sitting around thieving at stalls with an auto-clicker for 5 hours to make cash, There are tons of way better ways to make money!
Godwars has killcount, and all 4 bosses, with minions!
What are you waiting for? Join Gear-upX Today!
[SIZE=4]Home Page: [url=http://gear-upx.webs.com/]GEAR-UPX #1RSPS[/url][/SIZE]
Forums http://gearupx.freeforums.org/index.php?sid=e710e63a39b0acb534dc89ad26bd4803
